name: 巡るダンジョン
description:
Randomly generated 3D dungeon

.
Dive into a 10-layer dungeon called the Lost Forest and reach the goal on each level!
The dungeons are randomly generated each time you dive, so you have to carefully map your way through them.
The game is played with one movement and one attack per turn. When you move one step, the enemy moves one step.
If you get wiped out, you lose all items you picked up, so be careful!

Character customization

.
The player character is entirely up to you, including name, appearance and stats.
You can take up to five of them with you!

Hack-and-Slash

.
Sorry, this game has only a few conversations and no storyline.
I want you to stoically level up, collect items and reach the goal.
